00023 #include "xmlobjectlist.h"
00024 
00028 RainbruRPG::Core::xmlObjectList::xmlObjectList(){
00029   LOGI("Loading object list");
00030   this->filename="../config/objects.xml";
00031   doc=NULL;
00032 
00033   // Loading the document
00034   doc=new TiXmlDocument( this->filename );
00035   bool ret=doc->LoadFile();
00036   root =doc->RootElement();
00037 
00038   treatAllObjects();
00039 }
00040 
00044 RainbruRPG::Core::xmlObjectList::~xmlObjectList(){
00045 
00046 }
00047 
00051 void RainbruRPG::Core::xmlObjectList::treatAllObjects(){
00052   if (root){
00053     TiXmlNode* childNode = root->FirstChild( "Object" );
00054     if (childNode){
00055       TiXmlElement* child= childNode->ToElement();
00056 
00057       for( child; child; child=child->NextSiblingElement() ){
00058         treatOneObject(child);
00059       }
00060     }
00061     else{
00062       LOGW("Empty object list");
00063     }
00064   }
00065   else{
00066     LOGW("Can not get a valid root element");
00067   }
00068 }
00069 
00075 void RainbruRPG::Core::xmlObjectList::treatOneObject(TiXmlElement* elem){
00076   const char* type=elem->Attribute("type");
00077   const char* name=elem->Attribute("name");
00078   const char* meshfile=elem->Attribute("meshfile");
00079 
00080   LOGCATS("Object name : ");
00081   LOGCATS(name);
00082   LOGCATS(" type : ");
00083   LOGCATS(type);
00084   LOGCATS(" meshfile : ");
00085   LOGCATS(meshfile);
00086   LOGCAT();
00087 
00088   TiXmlNode* childNode = elem->FirstChild( "Pos" );
00089   if (childNode){
00090     TiXmlElement* child= childNode->ToElement();
00091 
00092     for( child; child; child=child->NextSiblingElement() ){
00093       treatOneMesh(child, name, meshfile);
00094     }
00095   }
00096   else{
00097     LOGW("Empty Pos list");
00098   }
00099 
00100 }
00101 
00109 void RainbruRPG::Core::xmlObjectList::treatOneMesh( TiXmlElement* elem, 
00110                                                     const char* objectName, 
00111                                                     const char* meshFile){
00112 
00113   double dx, dy, dz;
00114 
00115   const char* x=elem->Attribute("x");
00116   const char* y=elem->Attribute("y");
00117   const char* z=elem->Attribute("z");
00118 
00119   elem->QueryDoubleAttribute("x", &dx);
00120   elem->QueryDoubleAttribute("y", &dy);
00121   elem->QueryDoubleAttribute("z", &dz);
00122 
00123   const char* name=elem->GetText();
00124 
00125   LOGCATS("Mesh name : ");
00126   LOGCATS(name);
00127   LOGCATS(" Pos : (");
00128   LOGCATS(x);
00129   LOGCATS(", ");
00130   LOGCATS(y);
00131   LOGCATS(", ");
00132   LOGCATS(z);
00133   LOGCATS(")");
00134   LOGCAT();
00135 
00136   //  GameEngine::getSingleton().addMesh( name, meshFile, dx, dy, dz );
00137 
00138 }
